attributes.action: create a National Holiday to mark the day of our Honourable Nation Saint
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have in this county a Nation Saint, St. George, and it is my belief that we should be shouting his achievements from the roof tops.  I urge anybody reading this to sign up and say yes to re-nationalising our Nation Saint.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
